@coderGirlnl @Netlify Excellent! Well, I've found that having a simple site (like one or two pages) which is built with a generator like @jekyllrb, @eleven_ty, @GoHugoIO, @ReactStaticJS, or @gatsbyjs, and showing deploys, rollbacks, branch builds and forms can show lots of possibilities.
